uizalivestream.uiza.rtplibrary.network

Class ConnectionClassManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uizalivestream.uiza.rtplibrary.network.ConnectionClassManager

  • public class ConnectionClassManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Class used to calculate the approximate bandwidth of a user's connection.

    This class notifies all subscribed ConnectionClassManager.ConnectionClassStateChangeListener with the new ConnectionClass when the network's ConnectionClass changes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ConnectionClassManager.ConnectionClassStateChangeListener
      Interface for listening to when ConnectionClassManager changes state.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ConnectionClassManager getInstance()
        Retrieval method for the DownloadBandwidthManager singleton.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of DownloadBandwidthManager.

      • addBandwidth

        public void addBandwidth(long bytes,
                         long timeInMs)
        Adds bandwidth to the current filtered latency counter. Sends a broadcast to all ConnectionClassManager.ConnectionClassStateChangeListener if the counter moves from one bucket to another (i.e. poor bandwidth -> moderate bandwidth).

      • register

        public void register(ConnectionClassManager.ConnectionClassStateChangeListener listener)
        Method for adding new listeners to this class.
        Parameters:
        listener - ConnectionClassManager.ConnectionClassStateChangeListener to add as a listener.

        Method for removing listeners from this class.
